snippet.title: Glory of Portugal Fortresses of Brazil Trailer
snippet.description:
Game Glory of Portugal Fortresses of Brazil. Developed by Odenir Finkler Geraldo, Directed by Wilson Finkler Geraldo. 
British pirates, Dutch and French Corsairs, Portuguese navigators, Spanish conquistadors, Tupiniquim and Tupinamba warriors, mercenaries from various countries like Germany, Italy and Poland fought for this immense territory in South America. Now, you will fight for the Glory of Portugal and defend the fortresses of Brazil. Game to be released in 2020.
